channel.title: CVE Feed for Atlassian -- Atlassian Jira

item.title: CVE-2017-16863|2024-08-05T20:35:21.252Z -- atlassian -- atlassian%20jira
item.description: The PieChart gadget in Atlassian Jira before version 7.5.3 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary HTML or JavaScript via a cross site scripting (XSS) vulnerability through the name of a project or filter.
